I¶

Features¶

  • A Python package to calculate Distinctiveness Centrality in social and complex networks.

Installation¶

Install by running:

pip install –upgrade distinctiveness

Contribute¶

  • Source Code: github.com/iandreafc/distinctiveness-centrality

Please Cite as:¶

If you are having issues, please let us know. We have a mailing list located at: project@google-groups.com

License¶
